mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT T.store_cd, T.article_id, T6.default_barcode, T.on_hand_qty AS qty1, T.effective_date AS voucher_date, T0.store_name, oper.c_operatorcode, oper.c_operatorname, T1.article_name, T1.dep_cd, T1.pma_cd, T1.category_cd, T1.sub_category_cd, concat(T1.dep_cd,' ',T2.dep_name) dep_name, concat(T1.pma_cd,' ',T3.pma_name) pma_name, concat(T1.category_cd,' ',T4.category_name) category_name, concat(T1.sub_category_cd,' ',T5.sub_category_name) sub_category_name FROM SK0000 T, ma1000 T0, ma1100 T1, ma0070 T2, ma0080 T3, ma0090 T4, ma0100 T5, ma1110 T6, t_operator oper
AND T.article_id = T1.article_id AND #{param} BETWEEN T1.effective_start_date AND T1.effective_end_date AND T.store_cd = T0.store_cd AND #{param} BETWEEN T0.effective_start_date AND T0.effective_end_date AND oper.c_operatorcode = T0.ofc AND T1.article_id = T6.article_id AND T1.effective_start_date = T6.effective_start_date AND T6.is_default = '1' AND T1.dep_cd = T2.dep_cd AND T1.pma_cd = T3.pma_cd AND T1.category_cd = T4.category_cd AND T1.sub_category_cd = T5.sub_category_cd

SELECT COUNT(T.article_id) FROM SK0000 T, ma1000 T0, ma1100 T1, ma0070 T2, ma0080 T3, ma0090 T4, ma0100 T5, ma1110 T6, t_operator oper
AND T.article_id = T1.article_id AND #{param} BETWEEN T1.effective_start_date AND T1.effective_end_date AND T.store_cd = T0.store_cd AND #{param} BETWEEN T0.effective_start_date AND T0.effective_end_date AND oper.c_operatorcode = T0.ofc AND T1.article_id = T6.article_id AND T1.effective_start_date = T6.effective_start_date AND T6.is_default = '1' AND T1.dep_cd = T2.dep_cd AND T1.pma_cd = T3.pma_cd AND T1.category_cd = T4.category_cd AND T1.sub_category_cd = T5.sub_category_cd

SELECT DISTINCT ma1000.store_name, ma1000.store_cd, sk0000.on_hand_qty qty1, od0010.barcode, od0010.order_date, od0010.article_id, ma1100.article_name, od0010.vendor_id, od0010.order_unit purchase_unit_id, od0010.order_price, ma1100.converter, ma1100.spec, COALESCE(receive_qty,0) as receive_qty, ma1110.order_batch_qty, ma1110.min_order_amt_tax,/*最低订货金额*/ COALESCE(min_order_qty,0) as min_order_qty, COALESCE(dc_m_order_qty,0) as dc_m_order_qty, ma1110.order_tax_type_cd,/*税率cd*/ ma1100.min_display_qty, COALESCE(sk0000.advise_qty) AS auto_order_qty, od0010.order_unit AS unit_id, ma0220.unit_name, od0010.order_qty AS order_qty, od0010.order_nocharge_qty, od0010.order_qty + COALESCE(od0010.order_nocharge_qty,0) as real_qty, ( SELECT ma8070.psd FROM ma8070,OD0010 WHERE ma8070.store_cd = #{param.storeCd}AND ma8070.article_id = od0010.article_id ) AS psd, (select od0000.order_date from od0000 where od0000.order_id=od0010.order_id) AS order_date, od0010.order_amt AS order_total_amt FROM ma1000, ma1100, ma1110, PI0125 PI1 LEFT JOIN PI0120 PI2 AND pi1.pi_cd = pi2.pi_cd AND pi1.pi_date = pi2.pi_date AND pi1.article_id = pi2.article_id, od0010 LEFT JOIN sk0000 on od0010.article_id = sk0000.article_id AND sk0000.store_cd = #{param.storeCd} AND sk0000.store_cd = od0010.store_cd AND sk0000.effective_date =#{param.orderDate} LEFT JOIN ma0220 ON od0010.order_unit = ma0220.unit_id WHERE ma1100.article_id = od0010.article_id AND pi1.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND pi1.article_id = ma1100.article_id AND ma1000.store_cd = od0010.store_cd AND #{param.orderDate} BETWEEN ma1000.effective_start_date AND ma1000.effective_end_date AND #{param.orderDate} BETWEEN ma1100.effective_start_date AND ma1100.effective_end_date AND ma1100.article_id = ma1110.article_id AND ma1110.structure_cd = ( select admin_structure_cd from MA0020 where structure_cd = (SELECT admin_structure_cd FROM MA0020 WHERE structure_cd = od0010.store_cd and effective_sts = '10') and effective_sts = '10' ) AND od0010.vendor_id = ma1110.vendor_id LIMIT ${param.rows} OFFSET ${param.limitStart}
